categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "O'Niner" was a Clone Sergeant who served in the Grand Army of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. He commanded the unit at Rishi Station, a Republic outpost on the Rishi Moon. He was killed when Separatist BX-series droid commandos infiltrated the base.

Clone trooper Sergeant O'Niner was in command of Rishi Station during the Clone Wars. The clones at the station were tasked with monitoring Separatist movements that could result in attacks in Republic space. During an attack on Rishi Base, O'Niner bravely defended the base until he was wounded. Telling the survivors to escape, O'Niner was shot in the head at point blank range by BX-series droid commandos. The droids captured the base but were unable to stop four members of his outfit from escaping.
